name: Non-existent NextActivationId returns 200 with empty body
statusMessage:
AssertionError: Expected 200 but got 401
assert 401 == 200
 +  where 401 = <Response [401]>.status_code

AssertionError: Expected empty body for nonexistent NextActivationId
assert False
 +  where False = is_empty_response(<Response [200]>)
